name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 430  Drying Dog Bedding as Daily Farm Routine
description:
This proof documents a routine daily activity at MaMeeFarm™: drying the bedding used by dogs living on the farm.

The activity was recorded on 2026-01-03 at 07:38 (Asia/Bangkok).
The bedding was aired outdoors as part of basic animal care and hygiene management.

This record reflects ordinary, continuous farm work and is preserved under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) system to maintain traceable evidence of real-life responsibilities, even in non-commercial or non-productive moments.

No staging, reenactment, or modification was performed.
